    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Digestion in the small intestine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdauung im kleinen Darm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Digestion dans le petit intestin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Digestão no intestine pequeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Digestione nel piccolo intestino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέψη στο λεπτό έντερο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Digestión en el intestino pequeño</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the villi and the capillaries in the small intestine that work to absorb the food and transport it into the blood.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capillaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Digestion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">small intestine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">villi</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Darmzotten und die 
Kapillaren im kleinen Darm, die arbeiten, um die Nahrung aufzusaugen 
und sie in das Blut zu transportieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les villus et les 
capillaires dans le petit intestin qui travaillent pour absorber la 
nourriture et pour la transporter dans le sang.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os villi e os capilares 
no intestine pequeno que trabalham para absorver o alimento e para o 
transportar no sangue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i villi ed i vasi 
capillari nel piccolo intestino che funzionano per assorbire 
l'alimento e per trasportarli nell'anima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει villi και τα τριχοειδή 
αγγεία στο λεπτό έντερο εκείνη η εργασία για να απορροφήσει τα 
τρόφιμα και να τα μεταφέρει στο αίμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los villi y los tubos 
capilares en el intestino pequeño que trabajan para absorber el 
alimento y para transportarlo en la sangre.</string>
          </description>
